Package it.polimi.ingsw.messages

Class PlayCardMessage

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.messages.Message
it.polimi.ingsw.messages.PlayCardMessage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class PlayCardMessage extends Message
The class PlayCardMessage represent the action that play an assistant card in the game, extends the class Message and implement the method execute that apply changes to the game
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayCardMessage

      public PlayCardMessage(String sender, int priority)
      Is the constructor of the class
      Parameters:
      sender - is the sender of the Message, is a String that contain the nickname of the player
      priority - is an int representing the priority of the card (and the card itself)

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public Update execute(Game game) throws IllegalMoveException, NoPlayerException, OverflowCardException
      The method execute is an override of the class Message, apply all the changes needed to the model through the game to play an assistant card
      Specified by:
      execute in class Message
      Parameters:
      game - is the object that represent the game and is used to modify the model
      Returns:
      an Update object to communicate the state of the game to the controller
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - is the exception thrown if the action is not permitted
      NoPlayerException - is the exception thrown if a player isn't found
      OverflowCardException - if the Card doesn't exist or has already been played

    • getPriority

      public int getPriority()
      This method return the priority of the card
      Returns:
      an int representing the priority of the card
